subject: Bruce...
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Bruce:

I uploaded a file entitled, "Helphaveyoubrucedothis" - this may be a 
message to you. If it is saying have Bruce do this, then I must tell 
you how I had it set-up.  Let me know...

I am not sure what it is saying...any help would be appreciated.  
Bruce?  Thanks.  LOL ;)

LC
